main_definition: Sport is an activity involving physical exertion and skill in which individuals or teams compete against one another, often following a set of rules.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A recreational activity involving physical exertion and skill
meanings_and_examples.example: Playing basketball is a popular sport enjoyed by many.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Participation in sports as an individual or team activity
meanings_and_examples.example: She has been actively participating in local soccer leagues for several years now.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A sporting event, such as a game or competition
meanings_and_examples.example: The Super Bowl is one of the most highly anticipated sports events each year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Engaging in physical activity for enjoyment and not professionally
meanings_and_examples.example: I love to go cycling on weekends as a form of sport; it's great exercise!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A collective term for activities like football, basketball, and tennis that are played competitively
meanings_and_examples.example: Football is one of the most popular sports worldwide.
